issue.title: [C++][Docs] Fix output type of hash_distinct in docs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16742](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16742). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In the compute functions docs, the function `hash_distinct` is listed as having output type same as the input type. This is incorrect. Its output type should be: {**}List of input type{**}, the same as `{}hash_list{`}.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16742?focusedCommentId=17545628) by Ian Cook (icook):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13303
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13303>
